Wali Kota Semarang Boyong Komika ke SMAN 3 Buat Motivasi Siswa
07 Nov 2019, 22:25 by Yakob Arfin
Jakarta - Dalam kunjungannya ke SMA Negeri 3 Kota Semarang, Wali Kota Semarang Hendrar Prihadi memboyong komunitas Stand Up Comedy di Kota Semarang, yang bernaung dalam Stand Up Indo SMG. Menurut Wali Kota yang akrab disapa hendi ini, kehadiran sejumlah Komika di Kota Semarang dapat menjadi inspirasi para siswa untuk bisa berani berbicara di depan umum.
Hendi menilai para Komika memiliki sudut pandang kreatif pada sebuah persoalan, yang kemudian dapat membuka wawasan para siswa dalam menyikapi kondisi terkini. Pada kesempatan tersebut Hendi juga mencoba memotivasi agar anak muda mau bergerak, berproses, memperkaya diri dengan ilmu dan jaringan serta menunjukkan eksistensi positifnya.
"Teman-teman Komika yang hari ini hadir menjadi contoh anak muda yang eksistensinya disalurkan secara positif," kata hendi dalam keterangan tertulis, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Kepada para siswa hendi juga mengungkapkan bahwa kesuksesan tergantung pada orang tua adalah anggapan yang salah. Karena tidak ada ceritanya, seseorang gagal karena terlahir di keluarga yang tidak kaya atau sukses.
Pada kunjungan Hendi kali ini, salah satu Komika yang hadir dalam kesempatan tersebut adalah Komika Kota Semarang, Ipin PW. Di depan para siswa Ipin pun berseloroh soal tawuran antar pelajar di Kota Semarang yang sempat viral.
"Dulu pernah viral video tawuran antar pelajar yang terjadi di Kota Semarang, tepatnya di jalan Kyai Saleh. Tapi kalau diamati videonya ini lucu, karena mereka saling serang, tapi tidak saling kena. Jadi cuma maju mundur saja sampai Kaligawe," sindir Ipin. "Tapi Alhamdulillah sekarang sudah tidak ada yang seperti itu, sekarang energinya sudah disalurkan untuk ikut membangun Kota bersama Pak Hendi," tandasnya.
Dalam kesempatan yang sama Hendi juga mencontohkan bagaimana Presiden Jokowi yang terlahir dari keluarga tukang kayu namun harmonis dan terbukti mampu menjadi pemimpin, presiden bagi bangsa Indonesia.
Ia pun mengungkapkan tentang bagaimana upayanya mengubah kondisi Kota Semarang yang awalnya sering rob dan banjir. Menurutnya rob dan banjir bukanlah takdir kota Semarang. Terbukti, dengan upaya dan gerak bersama seluruh warga Kota Semarang, kini banjir dan rob tak lagi menggenangi Kota Semarang.
Hendi pun optimis melalui konsep 'Bergerak Bersama', berbagai capaian Kota Semarang pada kurun 10 tahun terakhir dapat terus ditingkatkan. Perubahan wajah kota yang sebelumnya terdengar janggal ternyata mungkin dan bisa terjadi mulai dari pembangunan infrastruktur, peningkatan kualitas kesehatan, pendidikan, industri pariwisata hingga yang terukur adalah capaian Indeks Pembangunan Manusia (IPM) yang kini menempatkan Kota Semarang unggul di atas Kota Solo, Bandung dan Surabaya.
Optimisme dan motivasi inilah yang ingin terus ditularkan dan digaungkan Hendi dalam membangun Kota Semarang termasuk melalui komunikasi di SMAN 3 Semarang. Diakui Hendi, silaturahminya ke SMAN 3 Semarang adalah bentuk komunikasi untuk menjaring masukan, sharing dan mendengar curhatan warga sekolah sebagai bagian dari masyarakat Kota Semarang.
Melalui pertemuan tersebut, Hendi ingin semua warga sekolah termasuk anak muda merasa bangga dan memiliki Kota Semarang untuk kemudian berpartisipasi dan bergerak hebat bersama. Berbagai kanal komunikasi, lanjut Hendi, perlu terus dibuka dan dimaksimalkan untuk menangkap suara dan aspirasi masyarakat.
Dari beberapa kesempatan bertemu para siswa di berbagai sekolah, Hendi mengapresiasi respon anak muda yang aktif baik dalam bentuk pertanyaan, ide maupun gagasan kreatif. Keberanian dan kesempatan adalah dua hal yang harus dimiliki anak muda agar ikut berperan aktif membangun kotanya.

Semarang Mayor Boyong Komika to SMAN 3 Motivates Students
Nov 7 2019, 22:25 by Yakob Arfin
Jakarta - During his visit to Semarang City Public High School 3, Semarang Mayor Hendrar Prihadi brought the Stand Up Comedy community in the City of Semarang, which was under the Indo SMG Stand Up. According to the mayor who is familiarly called hendi, the presence of a number of Komika in the city of Semarang can be an inspiration for students to be able to dare to speak in public.
Hendi assessed that the Komika has a creative perspective on an issue, which can then open students' insights in responding to the latest conditions. On that occasion Hendi also tried to motivate young people to move, process, enrich themselves with knowledge and networks and show their positive existence.
"Komika's friends who are present today are examples of young people whose existence is positively channeled," said hendi in a written statement on Thursday (11/07/2019).
To the hendi students also revealed that success depends on parents is a wrong assumption. Because there is no story, a person fails because he was born into a family that is not rich or successful.
On Hendi's visit this time, one of the Komika who attended the occasion was Semarang City Komika, Ipin PW. In front of the Ipin students also joked about brawls between students in the city of Semarang which had been viral.
"Previously, there was a brawl video between students that occurred in Semarang, precisely on Kyai Saleh Street. But if you watched the video, it was funny, because they attacked each other, but did not hit each other. "But Alhamdulillah now there is nothing like that, now the energy has been channeled to help build the city with Mr. Hendi," he said.
On the same occasion Hendi also gave an example of how President Jokowi was born into a carpenter's family but was harmonious and proved capable of being a leader, president of the Indonesian nation.
He also revealed how his efforts to change the condition of the city of Semarang, which initially often rob and flood. According to him, rob and flood is not the destiny of Semarang. Evidently, with the efforts and joint motion of all citizens of the City of Semarang, now the flood and rob no longer inundate the City of Semarang.
Hendi was also optimistic that through the concept of 'Moving Together', various achievements of the City of Semarang in the past 10 years could continue to be improved. Changes in the face of the city that previously sounded strange turned out to be possible and could occur ranging from infrastructure development, improvement in the quality of health, education, tourism industry to the measurable achievement of the Human Development Index (HDI) which now places the City of Semarang ahead of the City of Solo, Bandung and Surabaya .
This optimism and motivation is what Hendi continues to spread and echo in developing Semarang City, including through communication at SMAN 3 Semarang. Hendi admitted, his hospitality to SMAN 3 Semarang was a form of communication to solicit input, share and listen to the curses of school residents as part of the Semarang City community.
Through the meeting, Hendi wants all school members including young people to feel proud and have the City of Semarang to then participate and move great together. Various communication channels, continued Hendi, need to be continuously opened and maximized to capture the voices and aspirations of the community.
From several opportunities to meet students in various schools, Hendi appreciated the response of active young people in the form of questions, ideas and creative ideas. Courage and opportunity are two things that young people must have in order to play an active role in building their city.
